title: Golden ratio
summary:
In mathematics, two quantities are in the golden ratio if their ratio is the same as the ratio of their sum to the larger of the two quantities. Expressed algebraically, for quantities 
  
    
      
        a
      
    
    {\displaystyle a}
  
 and 
  
    
      
        b
      
    
    {\displaystyle b}
  
 with 
  
    
      
        a
        >
        b
        >
        0
        ,
      
    
    {\displaystyle a>b>0,}
